gramGrp.pos:
REFL VB
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
To insure oneself or one's property
pomeni plačati zavarovalniški družbi, da nam izplača odškodnino v primeru, če zbolimo ali je naše imetje poškodovano ali ukradeno.

seg.quote: Insure your baggage before you leave home.
The house is not insured against fire.

sense.def:
To insure against something
pomeni nekaj ukreniti, da se zavarujemo, če bi se zgodilo kaj neprijetnega.

seg.quote: In years of good rainfall they expand their stocks to insure against drought.
